name: grass-audio
description: audio player class, using the bass library as engine

scripts.dev:build: tsc && node-gyp rebuild && cp cpp_src/lib/bass/x64/bass.dll build/Release/
scripts.prod:build: tsc && node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build --release && cp cpp_src/lib/bass/x64/bass.dll build/Release/  && cp build/Release/grass_audio.node bin/ build/Release/bass.dll bin/win/x64

author: lpradopostigo@gmail.com
